Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- 7.91 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Martin Parish School District, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a seven and ninety-one hundredths (7.91) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of said tax for one entire year being $3,046,000) on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public school facilities in the District?
